TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Shitan, title = Shitan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shitan} }

S.FORM: Shitan Shitan gu icuwa i Miaoli. ala atjunangn mapuljat 79.39 km² (ma'linpan atjunang 10.36 km², ma'linaule atjunang 2.57 km²). ala caucau mapuljat 387 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 156 a daceneqlan, Saysiyat (32%) a maqcuwa caucau. paiwan a maqcuwa caucau. a i vecekadan tua miauli king a shitangu. pasazaya tua samangu (samˊ vanˊ hiongˊ) a shitangu. pasakacedas a viri tua pinSa'o:ol; pasakacedas a navalj tua taian. kaljaqudjaljan a kadjunangan imaza a kemasi ta qiljasan a lima a patje qiljasan a siva. paljavak tua atjunang matja 7 qinaljan i Shitan. matja 1 qinaljan imaza, Sawi . cinalivatan kasicuayan a kaizuanan nia kacalisian imaza. qadjav a cavilj a 1900, djemaljun a ngaingai a papupaday imaza. tjaivililj, izuazua a ngaingai kata pairang uta imaza. izua milimilingan ta gadu a pasakaviri. pinapacunan a gadu azua a matu shize aya. shize aicu a anemanema qaca a qemuzimuzip se ciukuk. kinemenem a caucau imaza ta gadu kata puzaljuman tjaizua a kinazuganan nu vaik aicu a shize a kizaljum i puzaljuman. mavan shize a shitan aya imaza. kadjunangan a i vecekad aicu a shitan gu i tua miauli king. caucau izua 93.6% a caucau a tjatjuruvu imaza i shitan gu. papupaysu tataleman kasicuayan, pazangal a temalem ta paday kata ucia imaza. malialiaw a paday a tjaivililj, mavan putjavuvuk imaza. tatuluan izua tjelu a kedrikedri a gakku imaza i shitan gu. neka daigakku imaza. kakipucemelan iyubingkiuku (yuzeng) sasupuan na iyubingkiuku 354 a sasupuan na iyubingkiku se sawi' (shitan gu). remayurangan djalan na kasicuayan izua liaw a djalan na kasicuayan imaza i shitan. shitan a lizuk shitan a lizuk aicu a tjaizua a papatjezuan na sikamasantjelulj a palidring a djalan na taiwan kata sikamasan 124 a palidring a djalan na miaoli king. sipacacikeljan palidring a djalan sikamasantjelulj a palidring a djalan na taiwan: tjapazangal a palidring a djalan imaza. maqati kemasimaza a patje dahu gu kata sanwan gu. sikamasannemelj a palidring a djalan na taiwan: patje dahu gu kata lizuk a miaoli sikamasan 72 a palidirng a djalan na taiwan: nasinandjalananga aicu a tjadjaljav a kemasimaza i shitan gu a patje lizuk a miaoli. sikamasan 124 a palidring a djalan na miaoli king: kemasimaza a patje nanzhuang gu sikamasan 126 a palidirng a djalan na miaoli king: paka puzaljuman a mingde a patje lizuk a miaoli sikamasan 22 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: 獅潭鄉永興村北窩口﹝台3線113K﹞ ﹝台13線﹞ sikamasan 26 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: 3線116K﹞ sikamasan 63 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: sikamasan 64 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: basu basu na miaoli: sikamasan 5822 a kemasi ta 南莊 a paka 八卦力 a patje 仙山靈洞宮 basu na sincu: sikamasan 5657 a kemasi ta miaoli a paka a patje shitan imaza djamay tjavuvuk qaca a gang ucia

Shitan Shitan go icowa i Miaoli. ala atjonangn mapoljat 79.39 km² (ma'linpan atjonang 10.36 km², ma'linaole atjonang 2.57 km²). ala caocao mapoljat 387 caocao, ala daceneqlan mapoljat 156 a daceneqlan, Saysiyat (32%) a maqcowa caocao. paiwan a maqcowa caocao. a i vecekadan toa miaoli king a shitango. pasazaya toa samango (samˊ vanˊ hiongˊ) a shitango. pasakacedas a viri toa pinSa'o:ol; pasakacedas a navalj toa taian. kaljaqodjaljan a kadjonangan imaza a kemasi ta qiljasan a lima a patje qiljasan a siva. paljavak toa atjonang matja 7 qinaljan i Shitan. matja 1 qinaljan imaza, Sawi . cinalivatan kasicoayan a kaizoanan nia kacalisian imaza. qadjav a cavilj a 1900, djemaljon a ngaingai a papopaday imaza. tjaivililj, izoazoa a ngaingai kata pairang ota imaza. izoa milimilingan ta gado a pasakaviri. pinapaconan a gado azoa a mato shize aya. shize aico a anemanema qaca a qemozimozip se ciokok. kinemenem a caocao imaza ta gado kata pozaljoman tjaizoa a kinazoganan no vaik aico a shize a kizaljom i pozaljoman. mavan shize a shitan aya imaza. kadjonangan a i vecekad aico a shitan go i toa miaoli king. caocao izoa 93.6% a caocao a tjatjorovo imaza i shitan go. papopayso tataleman kasicoayan, pazangal a temalem ta paday kata ocia imaza. malialiaw a paday a tjaivililj, mavan potjavovok imaza. tatoloan izoa tjelo a kedrikedri a gakko imaza i shitan go. neka daigakko imaza. kakipocemelan iyobingkioko (yozeng) sasopoan na iyobingkioko 354 a sasopoan na iyobingkiko se sawi' (shitan go). remayorangan djalan na kasicoayan izoa liaw a djalan na kasicoayan imaza i shitan. shitan a lizok shitan a lizok aico a tjaizoa a papatjezoan na sikamasantjelolj a palidring a djalan na taiwan kata sikamasan 124 a palidring a djalan na miaoli king. sipacacikeljan palidring a djalan sikamasantjelolj a palidring a djalan na taiwan: tjapazangal a palidring a djalan imaza. maqati kemasimaza a patje daho go kata sanwan go. sikamasannemelj a palidring a djalan na taiwan: patje daho go kata lizok a miaoli sikamasan 72 a palidirng a djalan na taiwan: nasinandjalananga aico a tjadjaljav a kemasimaza i shitan go a patje lizok a miaoli. sikamasan 124 a palidring a djalan na miaoli king: kemasimaza a patje nanzhoang go sikamasan 126 a palidirng a djalan na miaoli king: paka pozaljoman a mingde a patje lizok a miaoli sikamasan 22 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: 獅潭鄉永興村北窩口﹝台3線113K﹞ ﹝台13線﹞ sikamasan 26 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: 3線116K﹞ sikamasan 63 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: sikamasan 64 a palidring a djalan na miaolit: baso baso na miaoli: sikamasan 5822 a kemasi ta 南莊 a paka 八卦力 a patje 仙山靈洞宮 baso na sinco: sikamasan 5657 a kemasi ta miaoli a paka a patje shitan imaza djamay tjavovok qaca a gang ocia
